overview: The girls are back, and this time they're working overtime...  Six scenes, nine girls and some brilliant extra features complete a sequel which has been well worth the wait. Packed with amazing moments of real lesbian sex, mixed with charm and humour. In the classic style of the VivThomas.com Studio "The Office Girls*2" is a top-notch DVD which will appeal to everyone.  Office romances, sexual harassment in the work-place, managers taking advantage of the young girls, back-scratching interviews, business trips, hotel rooms, closed-door meetings, it's about to kick off!
title: The Office Girls 2
